text: "What About Love" is a 1985 single by American hard rock group by Heart. It was taken from their 1985 self-titled album. It was a major comeback for the group. It went to the top 10 in Canada and the United States. == References == Category:1985 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Heart (band) songs Category:Kelly Clarkson songs
title: What About Love
